home_section.name: Julio Tonatiuh Aguilera Ordoñez
home_section.introduction: I'm a Game Designer specialized in creating compelling gameplay experiences and level design. With over 3 years of experience working on indie game projects, I’ve led teams, designed core mechanics, and developed levels across various genres—from puzzle shooters to narrative-driven platformers. I’m skilled in C#, Unity, and collaborative development, and I’m always looking for new challenges to push player interaction and design innovation further.

about_section.description: I'm a Game Designer passionate about creating games that blend fun mechanics with meaningful stories. Since 2021, I’ve been making games to craft experiences that connect gameplay and narrative in engaging ways. I love designing mechanics that surprise players, building worlds they can get lost in, and learning from every game I play or read about. For me, game development is a space to explore ideas, tell stories, and keep growing with each new project.

card_6.card_text: Software and video game development(Currently Studying)

card_1.card_text: Degree on Interactive Software Development and Video Games

2D Side scroller, platformer and puzzle game.

card_4.card_text:

card_5.card_text:

card_6.card_text:

card_1.card_text: Experienced in game development, prototyping gameplay systems, and level design directly within the engine for 2D and 3D games.

card_2.card_text: Experienced in game development, prototyping gameplay systems, and level design directly within the engine for 3D games and VR.

card_3.card_text: Experienced in creating 3D assets for prototypes, blockouts and simple props, ready for use in Unity and in UE5.

card_4.card_text: Experienced in creating 3D assets for prototypes and blockouts, ready for use in Unity and in UE5.

card_5.card_text: I design and build levels that support gameplay mechanics and narrative structure.

card_6.card_text: Experienced in implementing mechanics directly in Game Engines, as well as collaborating with programmers and designers to refine interactions and balance.

card_7.card_text: I focus on designing gameplay mechanics and level structures that seamlessly integrate with the story, creating immersive experiences where narrative and gameplay reinforce each other.

card_8.card_text: Experienced in creating clear, organized documentation for game design, level flow, mechanics, and development processes.

card_3.card_text: 2D Side scroller, platformer and puzzle game.
